title: Patch Notes
content: terochromia on tieflings where setting the left eye to an elven or demonic colour with the right eye set to a regular colour would cause the left eye to glow incorrectly. Kerz, the half-orc hireling, was wearing clothes that didn't fit properly. We found a tailor and everything's looking spiffy now. Fixed the standard male gnome underwear being visible through several types of armour. Fixed druid armour clipping on male dragonborn characters.
